incrementADome() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CellTest
If a cell is a dome it can nob be built anymore and it remains unchanged.
incrementFrom3toDome() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CellTest
When a cell has a height of 3 and it is not a dome it becomes a dome
incrementHeight() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Cell
Increment the height of a Cell by one The height start from zero and can be incremented up to 3 If a cell with an height of 3 is incremented it becomes a dome and become un-buildable

initGame() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
Set the turn on first player, than create a random list of 2 or 3 god cards and update the turn to the second player Ask the second player what god he want to use and send a wait message to the 1st and 3rd players.
